text: What's up everyone? Taking a quick look at the GameStop options chain to kick us off for this week. I just want to see if anything looks interesting over the weekend. If we've seen any changes in volatility, we'll make a quick update on what we have in terms of open interest, volatility, volume, those kinds of things so that we know what we're heading into. And a quick shout out to my buddy Richard, he and I spoke yesterday for a good part of the afternoon. It was like four hour conversation. It was so, so useful to me because as I've mentioned to you guys numerous times, I am a guest in this house. I don't have all of the background the history that you all do, but I am enthralled by the story. It's a giant puzzle that I'm enjoying interacting with because I've been trading options for a long time. I'm pretty good at that. And it becomes generally programmatic after a while. So having something pop up like this that truly is anomalous is been very fun for me to dig deeper into. I've traded GameStop before during other episodes, but I didn't quite get as deep into the lore. And Richard essentially gave me a master class. He took the time during his afternoon to share that with me. So I'm beyond thankful. I'm sure most of you already know his channel, but if not, you absolutely should go check it out, subscribe. He

Might be a little bit late, but we'll have to see I'm doing a bunch of testing right now on that. So as always, any questions? Let me know, be an outlier. I'll see you guys later.
